categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Clone stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Basher was a stormtrooper sergeant serving the Galactic Empire before the Battle of Yavin.
Basher was bred a clone trooper during the Clone Wars and stayed with the Empire after its transition from the Galactic Republic. He expressed disapproval towards "modern" stormtroopers.
Sergeant Basher set to be voiced by Dee Bradley Baker in the canceled Star Wars Detours series.
